name: receiverCode
description: The CBP assigned code for the ‘data processing’ site/location of the transmitter (i.e., both sender of the batch and recipient of the response).

name: senderCode
description: Transmitter’s identification code (as assigned by CBP).

name: communicationPassword
description: A pre-established password used to authorize the transmitter of the data.

name: transmissionDate
description: Transmitter’s date of batch transmission. These positions are returned, unmodified, in the A-Record returned in the response to the batch (format MMDDYY). Space fill if not used.

name: appCode
description: A code that identifies the type of transaction data within the batch.

name: officeCode
description: A code agreed upon by the transmitter and CBP representing a specific ‘office’ (or sub-location). Space fill if not used.

name: transmiterInternalNo
description: Provided for the transmitter's internal use. These positions are returned, unmodified, in the A-Record returned in the response to the batch. Space fill if not used.
